revised_title: Observations on Polypus Reproduction and Feeding Behavior
tldr: The author describes his visit to Mr. Trembley's study, where he observed the reproduction and feeding behavior of polyps. He witnessed the polyps' rapid growth, regeneration, and voracious appetite for small aquatic animalcules. The author also mentions the appearance of a double-headed polyp and the transparent body of the polyp, which allowed him to see the ingested animalcules and their eyes.
